title: GitHub Action Compromise Puts CI/CD Secrets at Risk in Over 23,000 Repositories
description: Cybersecurity researchers are calling attention to an incident in which the popular GitHub Action tj-actions/changed-files was compromised to leak secrets from repositories using the continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) workflow.
